{"Car Data Filename":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"filename":false,"flow":false},"p_in":{"flow":false,"id":false}},"name":"Car Data Filename","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"self.pinOut.filename.value = "beamLR/garage/car" .. self.pinIn.id.value"},"pins":[["in","flow","flow"],["out","flow","flow"],{"2":"number","1":"in","5":"","3":"id"},{"2":"string","1":"out","5":"","3":"filename"}],"data":{}},"Detailed Damage String":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false,"format":false},"p_in":{"ready":false,"damageData":false,"flow":false,"devices":false}},"name":"Detailed Damage String","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"if self.pinIn.ready.value then
local devices = self.pinIn.devices.value
local dtable = self.pinIn.damageData.value
local valtext = ""
local text = "Damage Data : \n"

for k,v in pairs(devices) do
if dtable[k] ~= nil then
text = text .. "\n\t" .. k .. " :\n\n"
for _,dev in pairs(devices[k]) do
if dtable[k][dev] ~= nil then
valtext = string.format("%s", dtable[k][dev])
text = text .. "\t\t" .. dev .. " : " .. valtext .. "\n"
end
end
end
end

self.pinOut.format.value = text

else 

self.pinOut.format.value = "Loading..."

end
"},"pins":[["in","flow","flow"],["out","flow","flow"],{"2":"table","1":"in","5":"","3":"damageData"},{"2":"string","1":"out","5":"","3":"format"},{"2":"bool","1":"in","5":"","3":"ready"},{"2":"table","1":"in","5":"","3":"devices"}],"data":{}},"Car Shop Manager":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"slotCount":false,"cams":false,"flow":false,"slots":false,"stock":false},"p_in":{"shopData":false,"flow":false}},"name":"Car Shop Manager","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"local dtable = self.pinIn.shopData.value
local cams = {}
local stock = {}
local slots = {}

for i=0,tonumber(dtable["slots"]) do
  if math.random() < tonumber(dtable["chance"]) then
    stock[i] = dtable["model" .. math.random(0,dtable["models"])]
  end
end
self.pinOut.stock.value = stock

for i=0,tonumber(dtable["slots"]) do
  slots["slot" .. i .. "p"] = dtable["slot" .. i .. "p"]
  slots["slot" .. i .. "r"] = dtable["slot" .. i .. "r"]
end
self.pinOut.cams.value = cams

for i=0,tonumber(dtable["slots"]) do
  cams["cam" .. i .. "p"] = dtable["cam" .. i .. "p"]
  cams["cam" .. i .. "r"] = dtable["cam" .. i .. "r"]
end
self.pinOut.slots.value = slots
self.pinOut.slotCount.value = tonumber(dtable["slots"])
"},"pins":[["in","flow","flow"],["out","flow","flow"],{"2":"table","5":"","1":"out","3":"stock"},{"2":"table","5":"","1":"in","3":"shopData"},{"2":"number","5":"","1":"out","3":"slotCount"},{"2":"table","5":"","1":"out","3":"slots"},{"2":"table","5":"","1":"out","3":"cams"}],"data":{}},"VLUA Table Exec":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false},"p_in":{"flow":false,"cmd":false,"idtable":false}},"name":"VLUA Table Exec","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"local ve

if v ~= -1 then

end
end"},"pins":[{"2":"flow","6":true,"5":"Inflow for this node.","1":"in","3":"flow"},{"2":"flow","6":true,"5":"Outflow for this node.","1":"out","3":"flow"},{"2":"table","5":"","1":"in","3":"idtable"},{"2":"string","5":"","1":"in","3":"cmd"}],"data":{}},"Add Car To Garage":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false},"p_in":{"flow":false,"count":false,"model":false,"config":false}},"name":"Add Car To Garage","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"local filedata = ""

text = text .. "Damage : " .. damage

local devices = self.pinIn.devices.value
local vecmd = ""
local dtable = {}
local ve = scenetree.findObjectById(self.pinIn.veid.value)
local cfid = ""
local cfidval = 0

if ve.queueLuaCommand ~= nil then
self.pinOut.ready.value = true

-- Loop to fetch damage values and add them to table

for k,v in pairs(devices) do
dtable[k] = {}
for _,dev in pairs(devices[k]) do

toFetch = "damageTracker.getDamage('" .. k .. "', '" .. dev .. "')"
cfid = "dmgtrk" .. cfidval
vecmd = "obj:queueGameEngineLua(string.format('extensions.vluaFetchModule.fetch(%s,%q)', " .. toFetch .. ",'" .. cfid .."'))"
ve:queueLuaCommand(vecmd)
dtable[k][dev] = extensions.vluaFetchModule.getVal(cfid)
cfidval = cfidval + 1
end
end

else

self.pinOut.ready.value = false

end

self.pinOut.damageData.value = dtable"},"pins":[["in","flow","flow"],["out","flow","flow"],{"2":"number","5":"","1":"in","3":"veid"},{"2":"table","5":"","1":"out","3":"damageData"},{"2":"bool","5":"","1":"out","3":"ready"},{"2":"table","5":"","1":"in","3":"devices"}],"data":{}},"Load Data Table":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false,"output":false},"p_in":{"filename":false,"flow":false}},"name":"Load Data Table","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"local filedata = readFile(self.pinIn.filename.value)

}

self.pinOut.reward.value = mission_reward[self.pinIn.mid.value]"},"pins":[{"2":"flow","6":true,"5":"Inflow for this node.","1":"in","3":"flow"},{"2":"flow","6":true,"5":"Outflow for this node.","1":"out","3":"flow"}],"data":{}},"Calculate Damage Cost":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false,"totalCost":false,"costTable":false},"p_in":{"priceTable":false,"extDmg":false,"flow":false,"dmgTable":false}},"name":"Calculate Damage Cost","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"local dtable = self.pinIn.dmgTable.value
local ptable = self.pinIn.priceTable.value
local priceTableKey = ""
local currentDamage = false
local partCost = 0
local totalCost = 0

for k,v in pairs(dtable) do
if dtable[k] ~= nil then
for dev,val in pairs(dtable[k]) do
if val == true then 
priceTableKey = k .. "." .. dev
partCost = ptable[priceTableKey] or 0
totalCost = totalCost+partCost

end
end
end
end

totalCost = totalCost + math.floor((self.pinIn.extDmg.value or 0) / 100)

self.pinOut.totalCost.value = totalCost"},"pins":[{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"in","5":"Inflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"out","5":"Outflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"table","1":"in","5":"","3":"dmgTable"},{"2":"table","1":"in","5":"","3":"priceTable"},{"2":"number","1":"out","5":"","3":"totalCost"},{"2":"table","1":"out","5":"","3":"costTable"},{"2":"number","1":"in","5":"","3":"extDmg"}],"data":{}},"Get Car Description":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false},"p_in":{"flow":false}},"name":"Get Car Description","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":""},"pins":[{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"in","5":"Inflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"out","5":"Outflow for this node.","3":"flow"}],"data":{}},"Delete Object Table":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false},"p_in":{"flow":false,"idtable":false}},"name":"Delete Object Table","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"local currentObj

local filename = self.pinIn.input.value[self.pinIn.selected.value]
if filename ~= nil then
local filedata = readFile(filename)
for k,v in string.gmatch(filedata, "([%w%p]+)=([%w%p]+)") do
    dtable[k] = v

"},"pins":[{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"in","5":"Inflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"out","5":"Outflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"table","5":"","1":"in","3":"input"},{"2":"number","5":"","1":"in","3":"selected"},{"2":"table","5":"","1":"out","3":"output"}],"data":{}},"Transform From Table":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"rot":false,"pos":false,"flow":false},"p_in":{"data":false,"prefix":false,"flow":false,"selected":false}},"name":"Transform From Table","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"local dtable = self.pinIn.data.value
local line = dtable[self.pinIn.prefix.value .. self.pinIn.selected.value .. "p"]
local iter = 0
local posVal = {}
local rotVal = {}
for s in string.gmatch(line,"([^,]+)") do
  posVal[iter] = tonumber(s)
  iter=iter+1
end
line = dtable[self.pinIn.prefix.value .. self.pinIn.selected.value .. "r"]
iter = 0
for s in string.gmatch(line,"([^,]+)") do
  rotVal[iter] = tonumber(s)
  iter=iter+1
end
self.pinOut.pos.value = {posVal[0],posVal[1],posVal[2]}
self.pinOut.rot.value = {rotVal[0], rotVal[1], rotVal[2], rotVal[3]}

local newFuelValue = self.pinIn.currentGas.value + self.pinIn.addedGas.value
ve = scenetree.findObjectById(self.pinIn.veid.value)

self.pinOut.paid.value = true
else

end"},"pins":[{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"in","5":"Inflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"out","5":"Outflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"number","1":"in","5":"","3":"veid"},{"2":"number","1":"in","5":"","3":"gasCost"},{"2":"number","1":"in","5":"","3":"money"},{"2":"number","1":"in","5":"","3":"currentGas"},{"2":"number","1":"in","5":"","3":"addedGas"},{"2":"bool","1":"out","5":"","3":"paid"}],"data":{}},"GUI Hook":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false},"p_in":{"val":false,"flow":false,"key":false}},"name":"GUI Hook","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"local k = self.pinIn.key.value

local dtable = {}

self.pinOut.dataTable.value = dtable"},"pins":[["in","flow","flow"],["out","flow","flow"],{"2":"string","1":"in","5":"","3":"rawData"},{"2":"table","1":"out","5":"","3":"dataTable"}],"data":{}},"Spawn Shop Stock":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"spawnids":false,"flow":false},"p_in":{"stock":false,"flow":false,"slots":false,"slotCount":false}},"name":"Spawn Shop Stock","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"local dtable = self.pinIn.slots.value
local idtable = {}
local slotCount = self.pinIn.slotCount.value
local currentPos = {}
local currentRot = {}
local currentCarFile = ""
local currentCarFileData = ""
local currentCarDataTable = {}
local currentCarModel = ""
local currentCarConfig = ""
local currentSpawnOptions = {}

for i=0,slotCount-1 do
if self.pinIn.stock.value[i] ~= nil then

local line = dtable["slot" .. i .. "p"]
local iter = 0
local posVal = {}
local rotVal = {}
for s in string.gmatch(line,"([^,]+)") do
  posVal[iter] = tonumber(s)
  iter=iter+1
end
line = dtable["slot" .. i .. "r"]
iter = 0
for s in string.gmatch(line,"([^,]+)") do
  rotVal[iter] = tonumber(s)
  iter=iter+1
end

currentPos = {posVal[0],posVal[1],posVal[2]}
currentRot = {rotVal[0], rotVal[1], rotVal[2], rotVal[3]}

currentCarFile = self.pinIn.stock.value[i]
currentCarFileData = readFile(currentCarFile)
for k,v in string.gmatch(currentCarFileData, "([%w%p]+)=([%w%p]+)") do
    currentCarDataTable[k] = v
end

currentCarModel = currentCarDataTable["type"]
currentCarConfig = currentCarDataTable["config"]

-- Ready to spawn car now, got all needed data
-- Remember to store spawned IDs if possible to delete

local spawnPos = vec3(posVal[0], posVal[1], posVal[2])
local spawnRot = quat(rotVal[0], rotVal[1], rotVal[2],rotVal[3])

currentSpawnOptions = {config = currentCarConfig, pos = spawnPos, rot = spawnRot}

local currentVeh = extensions.core_vehicles.spawnNewVehicle(currentCarModel, currentSpawnOptions)

idtable[i] = currentVeh:getId()

else

idtable[i] = -1

end
end

self.pinOut.spawnids.value = idtable"},"pins":[["in","flow","flow"],["out","flow","flow"],{"2":"table","1":"in","5":"","3":"stock"},{"2":"number","1":"in","5":"","3":"slotCount"},{"2":"table","1":"in","5":"","3":"slots"},{"2":"table","1":"out","5":"","3":"spawnids"}],"data":{}},"Car Shop Car File":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"filename":false,"flow":false},"p_in":{"flow":false,"stock":false,"selected":false}},"name":"Car Shop Car File","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":""},"pins":[{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"in","5":"Inflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"out","5":"Outflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"table","1":"in","5":"","3":"stock"},{"2":"number","1":"in","5":"","3":"selected"},{"2":"string","1":"out","5":"","3":"filename"}],"data":{}},"RNG Init":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false},"p_in":{"newPin":false,"flow":false}},"name":"RNG Init","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"math.randomseed(os.time())

{

}

{
10,

10
}
self.pinOut.destid.value = scenetree.findObject(destination_triggers[self.pinIn.mid.value]):getID()
self.pinOut.desc.value = mission_description[self.pinIn.mid.value]
self.pinOut.reward.value = mission_reward[self.pinIn.mid.value]

self.pinOut.destpos.value = {destobjpos.x, destobjpos.y, destobjpos.z}"},"pins":[["in","flow","flow"],["out","flow","flow"],{"2":"number","5":"","1":"in","3":"mid"},{"2":"string","5":"","1":"out","3":"desc"},{"2":"number","5":"","1":"out","3":"destid"},{"2":"number","5":"","1":"out","3":"reward"},{"2":"vec3","5":"","1":"out","3":"destpos"}],"data":{}},"Prefixed Value Display":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false,"output":false},"p_in":{"flow":false,"value":false,"suffix":false,"prefix":false}},"name":"Prefixed Value Display","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"self.pinOut.output.value = self.pinIn.prefix.value .. self.pinIn.value.value .. self.pinIn.suffix.value"},"pins":[{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"in","5":"Inflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"flow","6":true,"1":"out","5":"Outflow for this node.","3":"flow"},{"2":"number","1":"in","5":"","3":"value"},{"2":"string","1":"in","5":"","3":"prefix"},{"2":"string","1":"out","5":"","3":"output"},{"2":"string","1":"in","5":"","3":"suffix"}],"data":{}},"Y=X+DX":{"dynamicMode":"repeat","hiddenPins":{"p_out":{"flow":false,"Y":false},"p_in":{"X":false,"DX":false,"flow":false}},"name":"Y=X+DX","type":"util/customLua","code":{"_executionStarted":"","_executionStopped":"","work":"self.pinOut.Y.value = self.pinIn.X.value + self.pinIn.DX.value
